original_text:
Return, O my soul, to your rest;
    for the Lord has dealt bountifully with you.
korean_text: 내 영혼아 네 평안함으로 돌아갈지어다 여호와께서 너를 후대하심이로다

sentences.original_text: Return, O my soul, to your rest
sentences.korean_translation: 오, 나의 영혼아, 너의 안식으로 돌아오라

sentences.original_text: for the Lord has dealt bountifully with you.
